skills.title: My skills
skills.skills-text: Hardworking and communicative. I like to learn new technologies. I am very well versed in english. I have studied software engineering at Saxion University of Applied Sciences in Netherlands. Team player, with experience working in foreign companies by Agile methodology. I like and I can solve problems. High adaptability and flexibility.
